nodes.text: The Mists of Forgetfulness was a location in a realm of the Force known as beyond shadows, which was reached by separating one's mind from their body, a technique which was mastered by the Mind Walkers at Sinkhole Station. it appeared as a misty area at the far end of the Lake of Apparitions. When traveling beyond shadows with the Mind Walkers in 43.5 ABY, Luke Skywalker and his son, Ben Skywalker, saw a strange being who beckoned them. However, when the spirit of Darth Caedus told them that they had plenty of time to get to her, they realized that they had anything but time, and returned to their bodies in Sinkhole Station where they were ambushed by a Sith strike team.
